Message.Title: Bad News for Amazon's Living Social: Carnegie Mellon University to get US$1.7bil after Chipmaker Marvell loses patent case
Message.Msg: NEW YORK: A federal jury on Wednesday found that Marvell Technology Group infringed two patents held by Carnegie Mellon University, and ordered the chipmaker to pay $1.17 billion in damages. The award is one of the largest by a jury in a U.S. patent case, and is nearly twice Marvell's profit in its latest fiscal year. It followed a month-long trial in the U.S. District Court in Pittsburgh, the home of Carnegie Mellon. Jurors also found that Marvell's patent infringement was willful. This could enable the trial judge, Nora Barry Fischer, to award triple damages, a sum close to the $3.96 billion market value of Marvell, whose chips are used for reading and writing data on hard disk drives.

Topic.Title: Amazons-shorting

Message.Msg: Buy for long term? How long is long term? This company can not seem to turn a profit. The excuse is always the same. Throwing money into innovation. Owning the next big retail idea. Etc. They CANNOT turn a profit. How long has it been, and last Q they earned a penny. Frankly, the pass that AMZN has gotten will someday come due in a balloon payment. When it does, this thing will dive big time. Am I short? No. Not yet. But I can't imagine there are too many traders out there who are simply blind to the reality that AMZN is a POS whose price (and your chance to make money) depends SOLELY on the next layer of buyers below you. No divs, no earnings, constant passes at ever ER.. When will this thing finally FALL ?

Message.Msg: I think it probably has a healthy squeeze tomorrow. I suspect we close over 250. Fast Money recommended shorting it (with which I agree), but shortly after that it tanked, drew in retail shorts and trapped them...

Topic.Title: Yahoo "thought police" are deleting bearish messages

Message.Msg: I've had my more content oriented messages censored for months. Welcome to the club...

Topic.Title: we may see 255 tomorrow

Message.Msg: I see a slim possibility of a $255.01 close... Given how well Fido and CW have played it to date, I have to expect they see the truly max pain play...

Message.Title: The trading gods said to sybil:
Message.Msg: "sybil, these are challeging markets, they are faje - do you homework and report your findingz to otherz. Now go and short the markets" So sybs did a macro economic study to find that the market cap of pumped up US stox / GDP iz : $19.05 Trillion / 14.60 Trillion or 130 % The historical avg iz 60% The 2000 peak was 180% The 1932-1940 low waz 20% When bondz and treasuriez are factored in with equities, all US paper iz 45 Trillion against a GDP of 15 trillion ... Our paper iz 300% or 3x our product.... Sybil wonderz if bernanke haz considered any of this? Anyway, amzn and the markets are a macro economic short... Now sybil haz provided you idiots with what the trading gods requested .....
